###ONLY RUN THIS ONCE.
This is the data pull for USGS data. It is many years and takes lots of time to grab all 300k records.
```{r}
site_id <- '09481740'
tz="America/Phoenix"

#creates table in R
USGS <- readNWISuv(site_id,c('00060','00065'),startDate,endDate, tz)
```
